articles.description: Gray has made just one first-team appearance this season, in the 2-0 Carabao Cup home defeat by Arsenal in September, and with his contract expiring next summer Leicester are keen to sell in January.
articles.content:
Brendan Rodgers has told England Under-21 winger Demarai Gray he has no future at Leicester.

articles.title: Kimi Raikkonen's car bursts into flames in another frightening F1 incident - Mirror Online
articles.description: There has been another fire on the track in Formula One, just two weeks after Romain Grosjean was lucky to escape with burns from a horror crash which caused his whole car to erupt
articles.content:
